模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit

类 UpdatableObject

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World.GameObject
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.UpdatableObject
所有已实现的接口:
Updatable
直接已知子类:
Bubble, Creature, Fruit, ProjectileObject
public abstract class UpdatableObject extends GameObject implements Updatable
Every UpdatableObject has a velocity, acceleration and direction.
另请参阅:
Creature, Fruit, Bubble

  • 构造器详细资料

    • UpdatableObject

      public UpdatableObject​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum, int width, int height)
      The constructor to initialize the unit
      参数:
      world - indicates where to add the object
      colNum - indicates the unit horizontal coordination
      rowNum - indicates the unit vertical coordination
      width - indicates the horizontal length
      height - indicates the vertical length

    • UpdatableObject

      public UpdatableObject​(int x, int y, int width, int height, InteractableWorld world)
      The constructor to add a unit into map
      参数:
      world - indicate the position
      x - indicates the horizontal coordination
      y - indicates the vertical coordination
      width - indicates the horizontal length
      height - indicates the vertical length
